This beautiful Renovated 1 bedroom 1 bathroom. Apartment has beautiful hardwood floors. Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances.

Conveniently located just 2 blocks away from the Broadway & 30th Ave N/W train stations; placing you a quick, easy 15 minute train ride away from Manhattan Places you right in the heart of vibrant Astoria with all it's amazing shopping, dining and nightlife. Apartment is located in the heart of vibrant Astoria with all its amazing restaurants, nightlife, and shopping areas.
